title: Jerk Chicken - Cassies Way
directions: 1Make the jerk rub by mixing all the spices.
2Toss the chicken pieces with the spice mixture, then cover, and marinate in the refrigerator 2 to 4 hours.
3Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Pour the vegetable oil into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
4Place the chicken pieces skin side up into the baking dish.
5Bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour 20 minutes, until no longer pink near the bone.
6Turn the oven on to broil, and cook until the skin crisps, 2 to 5 minutes. ( I used skinless breasts, so I took the thighs with skin and placed on top).
7This makes a fabulous juice you could dip the chicken into...
ingredients: 1 3 pound chicken, cut into pieces. i used 4 thighs/ 3 breasts cut up
1 tsp dried minced garlic - was out so used 3 minced cloves fresh
1/2 tsp red pepper flakes - i used more
